scripts.assets:copy:js: mkdir -p assets/js/vendor && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js assets/js/vendor/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js assets/js/vendor/
scripts.assets:install: npm run assets:copy:js && npm run assets:copy:icons
scripts.build: npm run assets:install && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.serve: npm run assets:install && bundle exec jekyll serve  --incremental --livereload
